definitions: The action of recording the time of arrival or departure, especially at work.
The action of achieving or registering a particular speed or time.
The action of hitting someone or something, especially on the head.
The action of observing or noticing something.
examples: He's clocking in early every day this week.
The runner is clocking an impressive pace.
She was clocking him from across the room.
The boxer was clocking his opponent with powerful jabs.
